channel.title: ::commands
channel.description:
Hi,
I run a 562 server, When ever i type ::commands it tells me to press the key under my esc. so it would be "`" but when i do that i type a command and then the command works. but it says this panel is for admins only you use ::commands. But i am a admin why does it do that?
Thanks for help.

item.title: ::commands
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

yea thats what i do, i am admin but i just dont understand… It’s very fustraighting as a server owner because my admins keep mowning.

Read full topic

item.title: ::commands
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“Samih1996, post:1, topic:366097”]Hi,

I run a 562 server, When ever i type ::commands it tells me to press the key under my esc. so it would be “`” but when i do that i type a command and then the command works. but it says this panel is for admins only you use ::commands. But i am a admin why does it do that?

Thanks for help.[/quote]

Are you sure you’re an admin? Use playerRights = 2

And don’t do ::commands just type in “commands”

Read full topic
